Class Ball

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameObject
      • Ball

  • public class Ball
extends GameObject
    Contains all the methods that are characteristic of a Ball
    Author:
    Jia

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class GameObject

        bottomRight, topLeft, xSpeed, ySpeed

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ball(int initX, int initY, int height, int width, int xSpeed, int ySpeed) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bounce()
      When the ball reaches any part of the frame's top or bottom edges it will bounce back.
      int checkoutofbound()
      Check to see if the ball goes out of bound in the x direction.
      void leftPaddleBounce()
      When the ball collides with the left paddle the ball is deflected and its xSpeed is increased by one.
      void rightPaddleBounce()
      When the ball collides with the right paddle the ball is deflected and its xSpeed is increased by one.

      • Methods inherited from class GameObject

        accelX, accelY, collide, getBottomRight, getBounds, getHeight, getTopLeft, getWidth, setXSpeed, setYSpeed, step

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • Ball

        public Ball(int initX,
            int initY,
            int height,

    • Method Detail

      • bounce

        public void bounce()
        When the ball reaches any part of the frame's top or bottom edges it will bounce back.

      • leftPaddleBounce

        public void leftPaddleBounce()
        When the ball collides with the left paddle the ball is deflected and its xSpeed is increased by one.

      • rightPaddleBounce

        public void rightPaddleBounce()
        When the ball collides with the right paddle the ball is deflected and its xSpeed is increased by one.

      • checkoutofbound

        public int checkoutofbound()
        Check to see if the ball goes out of bound in the x direction.
        Returns:
        1 if the ball goes out of bound on the left side of the frame.
